page.title: 04THE TOWN HALL
page.content:
The Town Hall was opened in 1962 and replaced the old Guild Hall.The Town Hall is much larger and grander than the old Guild Hall and has a large hall with a stage.This hall is in constant use especially by the local drama groups who perform their plays there.
The Town Hall has a very grand entrance which is only used on very special occasions.This entrance has been used in many of "The Carry On Doctor" films of the late 1960s and early 1970s.
In 1974 Windsor and Maidenhead Borough Councils were joined together and the Town Hall was used as the centre of local administration.
